conversation.Name: Alice
conversation.Text: Excuse me, sir. Do you have any information about the delay of the train?

conversation.Name: Bob
conversation.Text: I'm sorry ladies, but there seems to be a technical issue causing the delay. We are working on resolving it as soon as possible.

conversation.Name: Catherine
conversation.Text: Oh no, that's unfortunate. Will we have to wait much longer?

conversation.Name: Alice
conversation.Text: I hope it doesn't take too long. We were looking forward to reaching our destination on time.

conversation.Name: Bob
conversation.Text: I understand your frustration. We are doing our best to get the train back on schedule. Thank you for your patience.
